/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, lined with towering buildings and lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
